I am driven by a deep curiosity about how evolution has shaped the minds and societies of animalsâ€”and how these traits may, in turn, influence ecosystems. By combining molecular tools, bioinformatic analyses, and field surveys, I seek to uncover the evolutionary origins and socio-ecological consequences of animal behavior and its diversity.
